Attributes.description: Study of acoustics, audio technology, and electroacoustic composition. Composition of original works using the UBC Electroacoustic Music Studio or students' own software/hardware.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: MUSC 119 and one of MUSC 100, MUSC 103, MUSC 110. (Permission of instructor is also required.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Mon Wed Fri, Start Time: 11:00, End Time: 12:00, Building: Music, Room: 303
